Vital signs at your fingertips Check on your patients vital signs whenever you need and everywhere you are.
Digital treatments Prescribe treatments that will be integrated into your patient\'s digital health diary.
Recommended videos Give a look at the section of recommended videos on health and wellness
Streamlined healthcare Access the measurement kit and measure the vital signs that will be sent to your doctor.
Your health diary, now digital Look up to the vital signs measured over time and the treatments prescribed by your doctor.
Want to see what\'s nearby? AsilApp shows you nearby facilities, such as pharmacies and clinics.
Your healthcare payments in the app Keep track of purchased medications and incurred expenses.

Select your Country
Value ranges
Regularly measuring your heart rate allows you to assess cardiovascular health, detect potential issues, and take timely preventive measures.
Monitoring blood pressure regularly is crucial for preventing cardiovascular diseases. Early detection of variations helps manage cardiovascular health and prevent serious complications.
Regularly measuring body temperature is essential for monitoring health. Detecting variations can indicate early infections or issues, enabling timely interventions and preventing serious complications.
Regularly measuring glycemia is crucial for controlling blood sugar levels, preventing complications like diabetes, adjusting therapy, and maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
Why measure heart rate regularly? Why measure blood pressure regularly? Why measure temperature regularly? Why measure glycemia regularly?
